value.title: Mastering Starcraft 2: Playing vs WILD opponents... or so I thought
value.excerpt: In today's tutorial we take a look at a Protoss vs Terran I played on Pillars of Gold. It turns out to be a really wild game, but that's kind of expected when you're up against NA's notorious Skyler! The Loki of the SC2 scene. A very formidable opponent.  Mastering Starcraft 2: Playing vs WILD opponents...
